text: "Working on a Dream" is a 2008 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the title track to his 16th studio album Working on a Dream. It went to number 95 in the United States, number 9 in Norway, number 91 in Canada and number 26 in Italy and won a Grammy Award in 2010. == References == Category:2008 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Working on a Dream (song)
